title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-4.9 - Tax exemption
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-4.9 - Tax exemption

State Regulations

Travel on official business for housing authorities is
exempt from transportation tax and hotel occupancy tax. Tax exemption
certificates (Exhibit A of Appendix S-3) will be used to substantiate such
claim of exemption. Reimbursement cannot be made for any payment of a tax from
which the authority is exempt. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1625-4.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
